title: improve tesseract ocr text recognition
body:
I am trying to text recognition of Business cards. I am trying with following code,

let image =  UIImage(named:"IMG_93272.JPG")
let tesseract = G8Tesseract()                    
tesseract?.language = "eng"                    
tesseract?.engineMode = .tesseractOnly                  
tesseract?.pageSegmentationMode = .autoOnly
tesseract?.maximumRecognitionTime = 60.0
tesseract?.image = image.g8_blackAndWhite()
tesseract?.recognize()
let recognizeStr = tesseract?.recognizedText;
print(recognizeStr!);

But it's give some time not recognise text and give wrong text. I am also trying to make grey image and 640*640 wide before passing image to recognise.But nothing. I am trying with these sample images:

image1

image2
